attributes.action: Do not hand over Jullian Assange to the United States
attributes.background: Jullian Assange was arrested after being removed from the Embassy in London, in the United States he faces charges of Computer Hacking. We should not hand him over to the United States as his case would be politically motivated and he would face a unfair sentence.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

You can read more about the case here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/world-affairs/europe/extradition-from-the-uk-what-next-for-julian-assange/
